title: Umbrella (feat. JAY Z)
author: Rihanna
lyrics:
[00:01.50] Uh-huh, uh-huh (yeah, Rihanna)

[00:11.94] No clouds in my stones
[00:14.03] Let it rain, I hydroplane in the bank
[00:15.88] Coming down with the Dow Jones
